price: 46. Iyo inaad ahaato baaqe ugu yeedha (dadka) xagga Alle si Idankiisa ah iyo nal ifi.
arabic: وَدَاعِيًا إِلَى ٱللَّهِ بِإِذۡنِهِۦ وَسِرَاجٗا مُّنِيرٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wadāʿiyan ilā al-lahi bi-idh'nihi wasirājan munīran
